name: aas00
label: parental report: extracurricular activities (e.g., help with homework, remedial groups, leisure activites, etc.)

name: acc00
label: freetime and cultural activities with family members (self-report)

name: acp00
label: freetime and cultural activities with family members (parental report)

name: asc00
label: academic self-concept: verbal and spatial skill (preschool)

name: att20
label: attractiveness self-evaluation, evaluation of the other twin

name: bul00
label: verbal and physical bullying experience in childhood and adolescence

name: bus00
label: frequency of arguments with partner, frequency of arguments of parents, subjective burden and coping

name: cai00
label: characteristics of childcare institution and group

name: car00
label: childcare from age 0 to 6 (institutional childcare, private arrangements)

name: cer00
label: photos of school reports, self-report on school grades (current school marks, marks of highest graduation)

name: com00
label: competence rating of social skills, oral skills, concentration ability, communications skills, mathematic ability, general knowledge

name: con00
label: contact and contact frequency to biological parents, twins, siblings not living  in the  household (anymore)

name: ctb00
label: interviewer rating on task orientation and oral skills following intelligence test

name: cul10
label: cultural capital: reading, classical music, cultural discussion, cultural participation

name: cul20
label: cultural capital: availability of cultural property

name: cwb00
label: withdrawal (being late at work, calling in sick)

name: del00
label: long/short version of deviant-delinquent behaviour measure

name: dev00
label: deviant behavior young children (e.g. lying/cheating, fighting with other children)

name: dis00
label: discrimination on grounds of ethnic or cultural background, sex, religion, age, sexual identity, or disability, and burden of discrimination

name: dso00
label: discrimination on grounds of sexual orientation

name: eac00
label: extracurricular activities (e.g., early music education, drawing, etc.)

name: ebi00
label: interfamilial and extrafamilial: subjective evaluation of burden and stress and related coping capacities, burden and stress related to parenthood

name: eca10
label: history of education and graduation: educational degrees, vocational training, year abroad

name: eca20
label: history of education and graduation: skipping/repeating a grade

name: eca33
label: expected probability to attain a degree

name: edu10
label: type of education / training; current status of education / qualification

name: ext00
label: occurence of externalising problem behavior (e.g. being restless and easily distracted, having tantrums, lying and cheating)

name: fhc00
label: number of households in the family

name: fpc00
label: number of persons belonging to the family

name: fpr00
label: characteristics of family members (name, age, gender of twins; name, age, gender and relation to twins of siblings and parents who don't live in household; partners of twins)

name: gre00
label: existence of grandparents and frequency of meetings

name: hl00
label: family members living in the household

name: hoe00
label: quality of familial environment (existence of bedtime routine, general atmosphere at home)

name: hpc00
label: number of persons belonging to the household

name: hpr00
label: educational and employment status of all household members (employment / education / vocational training / parental leave / pension)

name: igf20
label: subtests matrices, series, reasoning and classification (CFT-20R)

name: ile00
label: intension to achieve certain life events (e.g. marriage, building a house)

name: imo12
label: intrinsic motivation for school in general

name: imo13
label: intrinsic motivation for math and German

name: imo22
label: learning motivation for school in general

name: int00
label: occurence of internalising problem behavior (e.g. headaches and nausea, nervousness, and being easily scared)

name: inv00
label: involvement of (step-) parents (expectations, support, encouragement and punishment)

name: iva00
label: interviewer ratings on the home environment (household)

name: lev00
label: occurence and subjective evaluation of different life events (e.g., marriage, death, unemployment)

name: med10
label: use of electronic media devices (time spent with, e.g., computer, internet, etc.), rules for media use

name: mig00
label: year of immigration, country of birth, residential status, language spoken at home

name: nbi10
label: child's medical records U-Heft (photo or questionnaire): selected parameters from examination U1 to U9

name: net00
label: social capital of individuals, e.g., close friends, frequency of social contacts, loneliness

name: par00
label: parenting style of mother, father, partner of father, partner of mother (parental self-report)

name: pas00
label: parenting style of mother, father, partner of father, partner of mother (child report)

name: pop00
label: political activity, political interest, party identification

name: prg00
label: information on pregnancy and in-vitro-fertilization of the twin pregnancy

name: pub00
label: beginning of physical and psychological changes, evaluation of changes

name: rel00
label: religious affiliation; church attendance; religiosity / spirituality

name: sat10
label: domain-specific satisfaction (health, work/school, income/pocket money, leisure time, family life, partnership, friendships)

name: seo00
label: sexual attraction to males and females, sexual labeling, sexual behavior

name: sop00
label: social participation: frequency of attendance in sports clubs, theatre, music groups or volunteer organizations

label: academic self concept: general self-perceived ability

name: spa30

name: spa40
label: academic self concept: self-perceived job ability

name: sre00
label: twin relationship: warmth, conflict, affection, hostility, rivalry

name: tra00
label: occurrence and subjective evaluation of important life transitions and developmental tasks (e.g. school enrolment, stays abroad, entering labor market, romantic relationships, change of social environment)

name: tsf00
label: twin-specific questions for partner (e.g. relationship of the twins)

name: tsp00
label: twin-specific questions for parents  (e.g., dress twins alike)

name: tss00
label: twin-specific questions for siblings (e.g. relationship of the twins)

name: tst00
label: twin-specific questions for twins themselves (e.g. relationship to other twin)

name: twt00

name: ugs00
label: subjective perception of inequality in private life and in society
